thread.title: Albert Weymouth
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Albert Weymouth

author: Albert Weymouth
title: Albert Weymouth
text: As there were no XL's left I ordered an XXL which arrived within two days with free post. The sleeves on the Liddesdale are extremely long even allowing for the extra sizing the sleeves are long and will need to be turned back or altered.
